meanings.definition: The part of a shoe that supports the heel.
meanings.sent1: She felt pain in her heelpieces after walking for hours in high heels.
meanings.sent2: The cobbler carefully repaired the worn heelpieces of the old boots.
meanings.sent3: As she danced, her heelpieces whispered secrets to the floor.
meanings.sent4: His determination was the heelpieces that kept him standing strong through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The heelpieces of the shoes were like sturdy pillars holding up the entire structure.
